paper_abstract: An approach to printed dipole antenna design using the artificial neural network (ANN) modeling technique is presented in this article. Three important antenna-layout dimensions are used to capture critical input/output relationships in the ANN model. Once fully developed, the ANN model has been shown to be as accurate as an EM simulator and much more efficient computationally in antenna design optimization. (c) 2006 Wiley Periodicals, Inc. Int J RF and Microwave CAE 16: 607-611, 2006.
paper_title: Printed dipole antenna design using artificial neural network Modeling for RFID application
